answers.answer: I have both times I've taken it. I never gestational diabetes either time though. I have another sugar test for this pregnancy next month.
I took the three hour a month ago or so, I don't have GD and I didn't get dizzy but it upset my stomach a little and I was exhausted later
I just had my second one today and both times I had to go straight home and lay down bcus I felt like if I stood up I would fall I was so dizzy

Well i have a 3 year old daughter and i can't remember.  I ate 2 waffles for breakfast and then had my test today around 4. Then i came home to cook and just got weird feeling and dizzy. I didn't have GD with my daughter and i find out Tuesday of i do with my son

question: Has anyone felt dizzy a couple hours after the sugar test.
title: sugar test
